abstracts.cdata!:
The First Agricultural Services Project
            will improve capabilities of the Ministry of Rural
            Development (MRD) in agricultural planning, strategy and
            policy formulation and project analysis. This objective will
            be achieved through the establishment of a Strategy and
            Development Office (Bureau de Strategie et de Developpement,
            BSD) in MDR, to be staffed with qualified Guinean and
            internationally recruited personnel. BSD will focus on: (a)
            the definition of agricultural strategy and policy; (b)
            elaboration and review of investment plans; (c) monitoring
            and evaluation of projects and plan objectives; (d) project
            identification, preparation and analysis; and (e) data
            collection and analysis. In addition, during the project
            period when other ministerial services are being reorganized
            and strengthened, BSD will be responsible for providing
            logistical and institutional support for start-up activities
            of new rural development projects and elaborating a long
            term plan for agricultural research and irrigation
            development in the country.
